name: Erde
description:
Erde is a game made by BoxBeetle Studio composed of two Chinese rookie developers. The game is a maiden work made with GMS 2 and is in nature similar to Meditation Games(https://meditations.games/) with no complicated gameplay.

In the game you can play as a birdie flying around and interacting with items in such a scene, which varies while the season, weather or time-of-the-day in the game changes.

Gameplay Video at https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1gG4y1f7fW.
